name: ecommerce-microservices-platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with microservices architecture

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: cd services/gateway && npm install && cd ../products && npm install && cd ../users && npm install && cd ../orders && npm install && cd ../payments && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:products" "npm run dev:users" "npm run dev:orders" "npm run dev:payments" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: cd services/gateway && npm run build && cd ../products && npm run build && cd ../users && npm run build && cd ../orders && npm run build && cd ../payments && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:services: cd services/gateway && npm test && cd ../products && npm test && cd ../users && npm test && cd ../orders && npm test && cd ../payments && npm test
scripts.migrate:all: npm run migrate:products && npm run migrate:users && npm run migrate:orders
